data.system_settings: IPod touch 5th gen iOS 9.3.5 only happens on 32 bit devices Proof: https://youtu.be/j1_R984HRFI
data.actual_result: Nothing happens and you stay in the server you where in before
data.expected_result: You should automaticly be sent to your new server
data.short_description: After creating a new server the user is not automatically taken to the new server
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1 Click on the plus under your servers and click create new server- Step 2 follow the steps to create your server
